name: Blowhole
description:
The birds have come... and they want your fish!

I pretty much made this game in a weekend, since I was busy with school and home during the week. So keep your expectations low. :)

Controls:

A/D or arrow keys to move

Click and hold to shoot water out of your blowhole (get it?)

Aim with the mouse

Try to knock those birds out of the air.
